# V2 Plan Overview

This folder contains the V2 plan for Vibe Remote, including background/vision, goals, implementation plan, and architecture/design.

Current progress: see `docs/plans/v2/04_v2_milestones.md`.

- 00_background_and_vision.md
- 01_goals.md
- 02_implementation_plan.md
- 03_architecture_and_design.md
- 04_v2_milestones.md
- 05_config_model.md
- 06_gateway_protocol.md
- 07_repo_and_split.md
- 08_web_ui_flow.md
- 09_cli_and_install.md
- 10_slack_permissions.md
- 11_web_ui_spec.md
